2.4.name: wordpress/wppageflip
2.4.description:
NEW RELEASE : Page Flip Book for WordPress is the best way to manage virtual 3D books you can browse with your mouse. This plugin allows you to upload, resize, border and re-order your images. You can also choose background image or texture if you need it.

Very useful to show your references, make a photo album, show your specials products... Don't wait anymore : take a tour or try it for FREE on http://www.pageflipbook.com !
